item.title: FREE FOOD! #coloradosprings #mutualaid
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

FREE FOOD!

#coloradosprings
#mutualaid

Chinook Center

ğŸ—£ğŸ—£ğŸ—£Food Alert - Spread the word! Our friends at Colorado Springs Food Rescue have an extra large amount of food available today (Nov. 12). If you or anyone you ...know is in need of a great box of fresh food for FREE, the pick up time is from 3-4 (you can arrive at 2:30 to get in line, but earlier than that is probably not useful!) Click their page link above for address, etc.! Thanks to CSFR for being leaders in our community in keeping each other fed!

Second large sweep of the week is tomorrow at the downtown central public library. Fencing off the area may start as early as 2:30am, and the sweep may start as early as 5am. Ways to help folx move: your car, bike trailer, shopping cart, dolly, bungee cords, rope, etc.!

item.title: This Saturday, 11/14 "We believe that diversity and...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network

This Saturday, 11/14

"We believe that diversity and inclusion only make our community and our voices stronger. Womxn of all backgrounds are encouraged and welcomed to participate; whether you are a woman of color, a woman of the indigenous community, a woman who belongs to the LGBTQIA+ community, a woman who belongs to the disabled community or a woman who is an ally to these communities, this is an event for ALL womxn so, please, come as you are.

This Womxnâ€™s March will have... a select group of speakers, all of whom are women of color. They will speak on the dangers facing womxn today, what we can do to create positive and healthy change and how you (and all of us) can use our voices as one to make an impact on the world around us.

Now more than ever, women are being targeted, having our rights slowly stripped away and the rights of our own bodies being called into question while we are faced with an endless barrage of double-standards, sexual harassment and assault, the idea that we donâ€™t deserve equal opportunity and much more while still having to navigate the structure of a world built on the idea that all women are second class citizens.

We ask that you, our communityâ€™s fearless women come forward to help create a future that is not only safe for every womxn but free of persecution, racism, ableism, sexism and discrimination so that the generations of womxn after us will no longer have to live their lives in fear.

We thank you for taking your time to read and hear about our event and hope to see you there, at the Womxnâ€™s March November 14th at 1pm at the Greek amphitheater in Downtown Denver."

See More

SAT, NOV 14

Colorado Womxn March

Colorado State Capitol

item.title: Denver Action Network+21Denver CommunistsOur comrade(s) who infiltrated the Colorado Unorganized Constitutional Militia passed along their...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network+21Denver Communists

Our comrade(s) who infiltrated the Colorado Unorganized Constitutional Militia passed along their Rules of Engagement slide deck. It is a vile, outlandish, and ...funny-if-it-wasnâ€™t-scary document that details violent fantasies they desperately long to make real.

One thing this document makes clear: the far right is chomping at the bit to hurt Black Lives Matter protestors.

They hate the anti-racist rebellion that has gripped this country since cops murdered George Floyd. They hate to see oppressed people fight back. And they hate to see solidarity with the very groups they attempt to scapegoat.

These white-nationalist, patriot militia-types think cops arenâ€™t repressing the movement violently enough, so theyâ€™re volunteering to do more. The Colorado Unorganized Constitutional Militia document, for instance, upholds Kyle Rittenhouseâ€™s double-murder as an example that, â€œas patriotically awesome as it was to watch, we need to learn from.â€

Right-wing vigilantism attempts to reinforce social inequality and uphold the status quo, not to subvert them. Historically, privatized and vigilante violence has been central to maintaining the racial and social order in the United States. Examples include the KKK, volunteer border patrols, the bossesâ€™ private security forces, and white-on-Black race riots.

The militiaâ€™s violent fantasies transform cities like Denver into war zones. They claim that â€œnot knowing where you are will get you killed,â€ as if there is danger inherent to urban neighborhoods. Playing to the fears of their mostly white, suburban and exurban, petit-bourgeois membershipâ€”the historic social base of fascismâ€”helps motivate them toward violence.

The ultimate dream of these fascists is for their racist, rapist president to go beyond instructing them to â€œstand back and stand byâ€ and give them the go-ahead to kidnap and kill protestors. They consider it an imminent possibility and they are actively making plans for that day.

Some highlights:

* The militia considers itself at â€œwar with political driven [sic] Marxist groups.â€

* The document is saturated with militaristic buzz words and concepts, like a chain of command and required combat gear.

* It details rules of engagement for â€œoperating against BLM and Antifa,â€ which it refers to as â€œadversariesâ€ and â€œenemies.â€

* It instructs the militia to â€œbe violentâ€ and â€œshoot to kill, never to wound,â€ when they deem it justified via their pseudo-legalistic framework.

* It details what kinds of weapons to use, including pistols with at least 30 rounds and 9mm capacity, â€œlong gunsâ€ in â€œmobile units,â€ knives, hard-knuckle gloves, and wasp spray.

* In addition to instructions to kill protestors, it suggests kidnapping them. For this purpose, militia members are instructed to carry zip ties and a â€œcouple ripped up t-shirts for gags and blind folds.â€

* It uses Trumpâ€™s racist phrase â€œChina virus.â€

* The document culminates in a bleak vision that demands the militiaâ€™s violent action. It claims the US is â€œentering into very dark timesâ€ when â€œpatriotsâ€ are outnumbered and â€œunder attack from Marxist [sic] that aim to destroy everything we have built.â€

* It ends with the white-supremacist, neo-Nazi rallying cry, â€œUntil Valhalla.â€ Thatâ€™s an appropriate ending for a self-aggrandizing death cult.

Hereâ€™s the full document: https://gofile.io/d/dTxESt

item.title: Denver Action Network+7Denver CommunistsLast night in Denver, 500 marched for Breonna Taylor. As they have done all summer, members of the...
item.content:encoded:
Denver Action Network+7Denver Communists

Last night in Denver, 500 marched for Breonna Taylor. As they have done all summer, members of the PSL and Frontline Party for Revolutionary Action and Denver S...chool Board Director Tay Anderson told the protestors to go home before 9pm. Most complied.

Those who stayed gathered for some speeches and faced off with a hostile driver. The driver ended up plowing into the crowd and was briefly detained by police two blocks away. No one was injured.

Then we marched to the District 6 police station. Cops shot tear gas and protestors lobbed the canisters back at them. With our numbers so diminished, we were unable to maintain the march against police attack. Hastily-constructed dumpster barricades were no match for the truckloads of riot cops that shot pepperballs at us until we finally dispersed.

Justice for Breonna Taylor will not be won by compliance with the system that murdered her!

See More
